spell.name: Seeker's Intuition
entries: You call upon your dragonmark's power to better uncover secrets. When you Cast the Spell, you can Recall Knowledge (Survival), Identify Magic, Seek, or Sense Direction, Subsist, or Track. You gain a +1 status bonus to the skill or Perception used for the roll, and this bonus remains as long as you Sustain the Spell.

3: You do not need to sustain Seeker's Intuition

spell.name: Lesser Seeker

frequency.entry: Once per day --- even if you have the focus point to cast it

entries: With a concentrated effort to bend the powers of your mark, you replicate the effects of a spell. When you begin to cast Lesser Seeker, you choose to replicate Expeditious Excavation, Status, or Locate. Lesser Seeker gains the traits of the selected spell, then you may replicate the spell's effect by completing the Cast a Spell activity using the normal number of actions for it. The replicated spell is automatically heightened to the level of Lesser Seeker.
You ignore any trivial material or verbal components of the replicated spell, but if the replicated spell requires a focus or material cost, you must still provide it to cast it.

items: {@b Greater Dragonmark} You may cast Lesser Seeker up to two times per daily preparation.
{@b Grand Dragonmark} You may cast Lesser Seeker up to three times per daily preparation.
{@b Siberys Dragonmark} You may cast Lesser Seeker any number of times per daily preparation.
